feed.title: Aimee Schulz
feed.subtitle: NSF Graduate Research Fellow at Cornell University

entry.title: A Seed Dispersal Game - Curriculum for teaching plant domestication and adaptation

link.title: A Seed Dispersal Game - Curriculum for teaching plant domestication and adaptation

entry.content: Alongside another graduate student, we have developed extensive curriculum for teaching plant domestication and adaptation! I will migrate some materials here, but in the meantime, check out our lab website: Maize Genetics Game.
entry.summary: Alongside another graduate student, we have developed extensive curriculum for teaching plant domestication and adaptation! I will migrate some materials here, but in the meantime, check out our lab website: Maize Genetics Game.
